Text:
Would mind telling me what the use could be of including an .idx file ( the file that tells the subtitles where to place themselves in de film) without including the .sub file (the actual subtitles themselfs)

It's mighty fine that you unpack the rars of a previous upload, but you might have forgotten something here: often subs are double rarred as in the original upload of http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6047868/The.Hatchet.1969.DVDRip.XviD-LAP is the case

So all non rumenianspeakers: you'll need to grab the subs from thet upload  to ( and double unpack them!)
